mapper.update: update ST_WAS_R set STCD = #{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, TM = #{TM,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPZ = #{UPZ,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DWZ = #{DWZ,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TGTZ = #{TGTZ,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SWCHRCD = #{SWCHRCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, SUPWPTN = #{SUPWPTN,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, SDWWPTN = #{SDWWPTN,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, MSQMT = #{MSQMT,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, STCD, TM, UPZ, DWZ, TGTZ, SWCHRCD, SUPWPTN, SDWWPTN, MSQMT from ST_WAS_R
